name: DoubleWave
description:
DoubleWave is a game where you can play with your friend locally and compete against each other in 12 challenging levels!

CONTROLS: player 1: use A and D to move and SPACE to jump! / player 2: use the arrows to move and number keyboard 0 to jump!

Invite a friend to play against you! Its simple to learn, but challenging to master!

Credits:

CTRLplay, for helping me to achieve my dream to make games.

and of course, you.
